alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Meeker; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:20PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meeker, southeastern Kandiyohi and north central Renville Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1020 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Cosmos, or 16 miles southeast of Willmar, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Litchfield, Cosmos, Greenleaf, Lake Lillian, Thorpe, Litchfield Airport, Strout and Corvuso. This includes U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 94 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Minnesota.
